QuestData.Title: Death to the Vilebranch
QuestData.Description: We're makin' good progress. Keep pressing on, and don't falter!$B$BThe Vilebranch berserkers fight like savage animals, whipped into a blood frenzy. Their shadowcasters summon foul spirits from beyond this world! This is why we're getting rid of these depraved creatures, $n, never forget that.$B$BHead to the middle tier and kill the berserkers and shadowcasters!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Vilebranch Berserkers and 5 Vilebranch Shadowcasters in Jintha'Alor.
QuestData.RewardText: It won't be long until we're the only dwarves left breathing on these walls.
